job_purpose: To accelerate AI-driven transformation, enhancing the Tasman Control Tower and delivering world-class solutions for operations and clients, contributing to new revenue and sustainability goals.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning models to enhance the Control Tower, optimizing fleet and warehousing operations.
Create AI-driven tools for customer acquisition, such as chatbots and customer journey mapping.
Implement predictive churn models and tailored analytics dashboards to enhance customer retention.
Use AI to optimize client supply chains and deliver cost savings.
Apply AI to predictive maintenance and resource allocation to cut operational costs.
Collaborate with tech team to integrate AI tools, ensuring scalability and innovation.
Develop AI-driven sustainability metrics to support ESG goals.
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s/Master’s in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related field.
Proficiency in ML frameworks such as Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch.
Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure.
Experience with real-time data processing and analytics tools.
preferred_qualifications: Knowledge of logistics KPIs and ESG metrics.
Familiarity with NLP, IoT, or blockchain in supply chain applications.
company_details: Tasman Logistics Services is Australia’s premier logistics company, leading in global supply chain innovation with AI-driven solutions, sustainability, and unmatched reliability. The company aims to achieve $1B in revenue by 2030, fostering a culture of excellence and sustainability under CEO Ivan Vanis.
